name: Okta Custom Registration
description: Improve the registration funnel but maintain the admin experiance of SSR.

TENANT_URL.description: The URI of your teant, this can be either the tenant itself https://<yourname>.okta.com or Okta behind a custom domain

REDIRECT_URI.description: Where to redirect the user to after registration has been completed.

SESSION_SECRET.description: A secret key for session data.

BRANDING_CSS.description: Absolute url to branding css file.
